詠う: (うたう) - to sing; (esp. 歌う, 詠う) to sing (one's praises in a poem, etc.)/to compose a poem/to recite a poem
詠じる: (えいじる) - to compose (e.g. poem); to recite/to intone/to chant
詠ずる: (えいずる) - to compose (e.g. poem); to recite/to intone/to chant
詠み人知らず: (よみびとしらず) - author unknown/anonymous; unknown waka composer
詠み手: (よみて) - writer (of a poem); composer (of a poem)
詠み込む: (よみこむ) - to include in a poem (season word, place name, etc.)
詠む: (yomu) - to compose (um poema japonês), to write, to use as the theme of a poem; to recite (e.g. a poem), to chant, to intone
詠人知らず: (よみびとしらず) - author unknown/anonymous; unknown waka composer
詠手: (よみて) - writer (of a poem); composer (of a poem)
詠歌: (えいが) - poem (esp. tanka)/song/composition of a poem or song; pilgrim's song/pilgrim's hymn; singing a poem or song in a loud voice
詠草: (よみくさ) - draft poem; draught poem
詠進: (えいしん) - presentation of poem (to court)
詣でる: (もうでる) - to make a pilgrimage
詣り: (まいり) - visit (to a religious site, e.g. shrine, temple, grave)
詣る: (まいる) - to go/to come/to call; to be defeated/to collapse/to die; to be annoyed/to be nonplussed; to be madly in love; to visit (shrine, grave)
試しがない: (ためしがない) - is never the case; has never happened
試しが無い: (ためしがない) - is never the case; has never happened
試しに: (ためしに) - as a test; as an experiment; by way of experiment; by way of trial; tentatively
試し切り: (ためしぎり) - trying out a new sword or blade (originally on someone, but now on soaked straw targets)
試し刷り: (ためしずり) - test sheet; trial print run
試し斬り: (tameshigiri) - trying out a new sword or blade (originalmente em alguém, mas agora em alvos de palha molhada)
試し書き: (ためしがき) - trying out a pen; test-writing
試す: (ためす) - to attempt; to test; to try out
試みる: (こころみる) - to try; to attempt; to have a go (at something)
試む: (こころむ) - to attempt; to try
試乗: (しじょう) - test drive; test ride; trial ride
試作: (しさく) - trial manufacture; experiment; test piece; prototype
試作品: (しさくひん) - trial product; prototype model
試作機: (しさくき) - prototype model; experimental machine
試作版: (しさくばん) - trial printing; prototype edition
試作環境: (しさくかんきょう) - test environment
試供: (しきょう) - offering something free as a promotion
試合に敗れる: (しあいにやぶれる) - to lose a game
試合場: (しあいじょう) - ring; playing field; stadium
試合巧者: (しあいこうしゃ) - experienced player; tricky player
試合終了: (しあいしゅうりょう) - the end of the match; the end of the game
試合開始: (しあいかいし) - beginning of the game; kickoff; face-off
試掘権: (しくつけん) - prospecting rights; mining claim
試料: (しりょう) - sample; specimen; test piece
試煉: (しれん) - test; trial; probation; ordeal; tribulation
試用版: (しようばん) - trial version (typically software); trial edition
試着室: (しちゃくしつ) - dressing room; fitting room
試筆: (しひつ) - first writing (of the New Year)
試算表: (しさんひょう) - trial balance sheet
試練: (しれん) - test; trial; probation; ordeal; tribulation
試聴: (shichou) - trial listening (por exemplo, a um registro antes de comprar), audition
試聴室: (しちょうしつ) - listening room (e.g. in a record store); listening booth
試行: (しこう) - making an attempt; trial run
試運転: (しうんてん) - trial run; test run
試金: (しきん) - assay (of metal, ore, etc.); assaying
試錬: (しれん) - test; trial; probation; ordeal; tribulation
試験で撥ねられる: (しけんではねられる) - to get flunked in an examination
試験を受ける: (しけんをうける) - to sit for an examination
試験中: (しけんちゅう) - under examination; under test (e.g. device); on trial
